price: Dúkìá rẹ̀ kò sì níí rọ̀ ọ́ lọ́rọ̀ nígbà tí ó bá parun, tí ó já bọ́ (sínú Iná).
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
